name: The celebrated theory is still the source of great controversy.
trans: 这一著名的理论至今仍是巨大争议的根源。

name: A good architectural structure should be useful, durable and beautiful.
trans: 一个好的建筑结构应该实用、耐用、美观。

name: A group meeting will be held tomorrow in the library conference room.
trans: 明天将在图书馆会议室举行小组会议。

name: A number of students have volunteer jobs.
trans: 许多学生从事志愿工作。

name: We can all meet at my office after the lecture.
trans: 讲座结束后我们可以在我的办公室见面。

name: Tutorials are scheduled in the final week of the term.
trans: 辅导课安排在学期的最后一周。

name: You can make an appointment to meet the librarian.
trans: 你可以和图书管理员约个时间。

name: Affordable housing is an important issue for all members of society.
trans: 经济适用房对社会所有成员来说都是一个重要问题。

name: Agenda items should be submitted by the end of the day.
trans: 议程项目应在当天结束前提交。

name: All dissertations must be accompanied by a submission form.
trans: 所有论文必须附上提交表格。

name: All industries are a system of inputs, processes, outputs and feedback.
trans: 所有行业都是一个输入、处理、输出和反馈的系统。

name: All of the assignments must be submitted in person to the faculty office.
trans: 所有作业必须亲自提交到学院办公室 / 教职员工办公室。

name: Economic development needs to be supported by the government.
trans: 经济发展需要政府的支持。

name: All of your assignments are due by tomorrow.
trans: 你明天应该交所有的作业。

name: The toughest part of postgraduate education is funding.
trans: 研究生教育最困难的部分是资金。

name: Our view is that educational reforms have been inadequately implemented.
trans: 我们的看法是，教育改革执行得不够充分。

name: Although sustainable development is not easy, it is an unavoidable responsibility.
trans: 可持续发展虽然不容易，但是一项不可推卸的责任。

name: Americans have typically defined the process of plant growth in quantitative terms.
trans: 美国人通常用定量术语来定义植物生长的过程。

name: An introduction is an essential element of presentation.
trans: 简介是演讲的基本要素。

name: The assignments should be submitted to the department office before the deadlines.
trans: 作业须于截止日期前送交系办公室。

name: Students will develop confidence in their ability to think critically.
trans: 学生将建立对批判性思考能力的信心。

name: Conferences ought to be always scheduled two weeks in advance.
trans: 会议应该提前两周安排。

name: Consumer confidence has a direct influence on sales.
trans: 消费者信心对销售有直接影响。

name: Convincing evidence to support this theory is hard to obtain.
trans: 支持这一理论的令人信服的证据很难获得。

name: Despite the protest, the chemistry department was closed down.
trans: 尽管有抗议，化学系还是被关闭了。

name: Despite their differences, all forms of life share certain characteristics.
trans: 尽管存在差异，但所有形式的生命都有某些共同的特征。

name: At that time, few people moved from towns to villages.
trans: 那时，很少有人从城镇搬到村庄。

name: Economic problems caused a big rise in unemployment.
trans: 经济问题导致失业人数大幅增加。

name: The economic status of the early Roman Republic will be examined.
trans: 我们将考察早期罗马共和国的经济状况。

name: The academic strength of the early Roman Republic will be examined.
trans: 我们将考察早期罗马共和国的学术实力。

name: Tomorrow's lecture has been canceled due to the power cut.
trans: 因为停电，明天的讲座取消了。

name: Students are permitted to park at campus parking spaces.
trans: 学生可以在校园停车场停车。

name: If you are not sure, phone student services for help.
trans: 如果你不确定，打电话给学生服务中心寻求帮助。

name: It is really a comprehensive program covering both theory and practice.
trans: 这确实是一个包括理论和实践的综合项目。

name: We are researching the most significant challenges that are faced in our society today.
trans: 我们正在研究当今社会所面临的最重大的挑战。

name: Medical researchers have focused on causes of diseases and treatments.
trans: 医学研究人员一直致力于研究疾病的病因和治疗方法。

name: Most university teaching still takes place in lectures and seminars.
trans: 大多数大学教学仍然以讲座和研讨会的形式进行。

name: Native speakers are exempt from the language tests in their own language.
trans: 母语者不用参加自己语言的测试。

name: Neurons are principally involved in chemical processes.
trans: 神经元主要参与化学反应。

name: Nurses can specialize in clinical work or management.
trans: 护士可以专攻临床工作或管理。

name: Organization plays an important role in academic literature.
trans: 组织在学术文献中起着重要的作用。

name: Organizational failure is considered from various perspectives in academic literature.
trans: 在学术文献中，人们从不同的角度来思考组织层面的失败。

name: Our professor is hosting the business development conference.
trans: 我们的教授正在主持商业发展会议。

name: Peer group pressure has a significant effect on young people.
trans: 同辈群体压力对年轻人有很大的影响。

name: Remember, the prestigious election of stewardship has strict eligibility criteria.
trans: 记住，这场有声望的管理层选举有严格的资格标准。

name: The speaker began by giving an outline of her presentation.
trans: 演讲者先给出了她今天讲座的大纲。

name: She has made a significant contribution to the field of chemistry.
trans: 她在化学领域做出了重大贡献。

name: She used to be the editor of the student newspaper.
trans: 她曾是校报的编辑。

name: Many departments have their own special book collections.
trans: 许多部门都有自己的特殊藏书

name: Statistical results should be expressed in different ways depending on the circumstances.
trans: 统计结果应根据情况以不同的方式表示。

name: You are advised to use multiple research methods for this project.
trans: 建议你们在这个项目中使用多种研究方法。

name: Students requiring an extension should apply sooner rather than later.
trans: 要求延期的学生应尽早申请，不宜推迟。

name: Teaching assistants will receive a monthly stipend for housing.
trans: 助教将获得每月的住房津贴。

name: Textile manufacturing plays a large role in improving economies.
trans: 纺织业在改善经济方面起着很大的作用。

name: Food that contains antibiotics provides little or no nutritional value.
trans: 含有抗生素的食物几乎没有营养价值。

name: A bar chart provides a useful means of data comparison.
trans: 柱状图提供了一种很有用的数据比较方法。

name: The archeologists were astonished by the previously overlooked foundations.
trans: 考古学家们对以前被忽视的地基感到惊讶。

name: New developments in technology are influencing current research.
trans: 技术的新发展正在影响当前的研究。

name: Most known oil reserves will only last for half a century.
trans: 大多数已知的石油储量只能维持半个世纪。

name: The artists tied to the conservative politicians earned the roles of critics.
trans: 那些与保守派政客有联系的艺术家成为了批评家。

name: The designers will complete the plan later today.
trans: 设计师们将在今天晚些时候完成这个设计图。

name: The rising inflation rate indicates a decrease in demand for consumer products.
trans: 通货膨胀率的上升表明对消费品的需求下降。

name: The essay will be published once the research is finished.
trans: 一旦研究完成，这篇文章就会发表。

name: The faculty staff are very approachable, friendly and extremely helpful.
trans: 教职工都很平易近人，友好，而且非常乐于助人。

name: The garden behind the university is open to the public in summer.
trans: 大学后面的花园在夏天对公众开放。

name: The history of the university is a long and interesting one.
trans: 这所大学的历史悠久而有趣。

name: The railway makes long-distance travel possible for everyone.
trans: 铁路使每个人都能进行长途旅行。

name: The results of the study underscored the importance of early detection.
trans: 研究的结果强调了早期发现的重要性。

name: The summer course is canceled due to insufficient enrollment.
trans: 由于报名人数不足，夏季课程取消了。

name: The new technician dropped the microscope in the biology lab.
trans: 那个新来的技术员在生物实验室里把显微镜摔了。

name: The theme of the instrumental work exhibits more of a demure compositional style.
trans: 这首乐器演奏的主题表现出了极为庄重的创作风格。

name: The visiting speaker used to be a lecturer in this department.
trans: 来访的演讲人曾是这个系的讲师。

name: The ways in which people communicate are constantly changing.
trans: 人们交流的方式在不断变化。

name: There is a clear need for further research in this field.
trans: 在这个领域明显需要进一步研究。

name: There is clearly a need for further research in this field.
trans: 这一领域显然有进一步研究的必要。

name: There will be a conference here next summer on using the web for academic research.
trans: 明年夏天这里将有一个关于使用网络进行学术研究的会议。

name: Our laboratory equipment is provided free of charge.
trans: 我们的实验设备是免费的。

name: Traveling by boat on the river is not possible in winter.
trans: 冬天坐船旅行是不可能的。

name: It would be extremely beneficial to work together.
trans: 一起工作是非常有益的。

name: This project is divided into four main sections.
trans: 本项目分为四个主要部分。

name: Understanding how to use the library will save your time.
trans: 了解如何使用图书馆会节省你的时间。

name: All students are expected to participate in all class activities.
trans: 所有学生都要参加所有课堂活动。

name: We can work together to achieve high educational standard.
trans: 我们可以共同努力实现高教育标准。

name: We support the research on problems related to tropical cyclone dynamics and forecasting.
trans: 我们支持有关热带气旋动力学和预测方面的研究。

name: Parents’ talk to children tends to be simplified.
trans: 父母对孩子的谈话往往被简化。

name: The essay is easy to write once the research is completed.
trans: 一旦研究完成，这篇文章很容易写了。

name: Manufacture can now employ more people than agriculture and fishing combined.
trans: 制造业现在雇佣的人比农业和渔业加起来还要多

name: Find out how to get resources before your research.
trans: 在你研究之前了解获得资料的方法。

name: Global connections thrived in academic communities, thanks to social media.
trans: 多亏了社交媒体，学术界的全球联系蓬勃发展。

name: The theater study course encourages students to exercise creativity.
trans: 戏剧学习课程鼓励学生锻炼创造力。

name: There are opportunities to receive grants in most artistic fields.
trans: 大多数艺术领域都有获得资助的机会。

name: This course considerably emphasizes critical thinking skills.
trans: 这门课程相当看重批判性思维能力。

name: Those who are considering a career in marketing should attend the talk.
trans: 那些正在考虑从事市场营销的人应该参加这次演讲。

name: Every student has both the right and the ability to succeed.
trans: 每个学生都有成功的权利和能力。

name: The university has invested in new technologies designed to support learning.
trans: 大学已投资于新技术，旨在支持学习。

name: A good research assistant is not afraid to ask questions.
trans: 一个好的研究助手不怕问问题。

name: Before submitting your dissertation, your advisor must approve your application.
trans: 在提交论文之前，您的导师必须批准您的申请。

name: Collaboration between departments is a feature of successful companies.
trans: 部门间的协作是成功公司的一个特点。

name: Experts are now able to forecast weather over a much longer period.
trans: 专家们现在能够预测更长期的天气。

name: Making mistakes is fine as long as you learn from them.
trans: 只要你能从错误中吸取教训，犯错误没什么大不了的。

name: Archeologists discovered tools and other artifacts near the ancient tomb.
trans: 考古学家在古墓附近发现了工具和其他手工艺品。

name: We have a lecture in the morning on Thursday.
trans: 我们星期四上午有一节课。

name: Thousands of people turned out to be at the presidential address.
trans: 成千上万的人出席了总统的演讲。

name: The plight of local wildlife has been ignored by developers.
trans: 当地野生动物的困境一直被开发商忽视。

name: A professor took one year off to work on her book.
trans: 一位教授休了一年的假，专注于撰写她的书籍。

name: The site is designed to be highly interactive.
trans: 这个网站被设计成高度交互式的。

name: The lecture tomorrow will discuss the educational policy of the United States.
trans: 明天的讲座将讨论美国的教育政策。

name: Social policy describes the ways societies meet human needs.
trans: 社会政策描述了社会满足人类需求的方式。

name: You should submit your term papers to the general office.
trans: 你应该把你的学期论文交到办公室。

name: Key business partners are often intertwined in expense accounts.
trans: 主要业务伙伴经常在费用账目上纠缠不清。

name: Biology involves the study of life at all levels.
trans: 生物学涉及对生命各个层次的研究。

name: Food has become a political issue in the world.
trans: 食品已经成为世界上的一个政治问题。

name: All medical students must clean their hands before entering the room.
trans: 所有医科学生在进入房间前必须洗手。

name: Implementation figures are expected to be improved in the next few years.
trans: 执行数据预计在今后几年内会有所改善。

name: The quality of your statistical information depends on your raw data.
trans: 你统计信息的质量取决于你的原始数据。

name: Certain organisms can reproduce using just one parent.
trans: 某些生物体可以只用一个亲本进行繁殖。

name: Protective clothing must always be worn in the laboratory.
trans: 在实验室里必须一直穿着防护服。

name: Sound waves are unable to travel through vacuum.
trans: 声波不能在真空中传播。

name: Make sure you choose a course that provides great career opportunities.
trans: 确保你选择的课程能提供很好的就业机会。

name: Undergraduates have a wide range of cultural modules to choose from.
trans: 本科生有广泛的文化课可供选择。

name: Social media is criticized for causing internet addiction.
trans: 人们批评社交媒体会导致网瘾。

name: The researchers are disappointed that the results of the research have been proved to be inconclusive.
trans: 研究人员感到失望的是，研究结果已被证明是不确定的。

name: We hold visiting hours throughout the year for students.
trans: 我们全年都为学生提供拜访时间。

name: International exchange formed the important part of our study program.
trans: 国际交流是我们学习计划的重要组成部分。

name: Food containing ample calories provides little or no nutritional value.
trans: 含有过多热量的食物几乎没有提供营养价值。

name: Make sure you’ve saved all files before turning off the computer.
trans: 在关闭电脑之前，确保你已经保存了所有的文件。

name: Many vocational courses at institutions are funded by private enterprises.
trans: 一些机构的职业课程是由私营企业资助的。

name: This book can be borrowed for a maximum of one week.
trans: 这本书最多可以借一个星期。

name: This essay will argue that technology does more good than harm.
trans: 这篇文章将论证技术是利大于弊的。

name: Distance learning allows you to develop a career around your commitments.
trans: 远程学习让你能够围绕已有的事务或安排来发展职业。

name: The history department is very active in research.
trans: 历史系非常积极地参与研究工作。

name: Graphs and charts allowed data to be more easily understood.
trans: 图形和图表使数据更容易理解。

name: The opening hours of the library are reduced during summer.
trans: 图书馆在夏季的开放时间减少了。

name: The coffee machine located on the third floor is not working today.
trans: 位于三楼的咖啡机今天不能用了。

name: Muscle cells bring parts of the body closer together.
trans: 肌肉细胞使身体的各个部分紧密相连。

name: You will learn how to rationally assess your arguments.
trans: 你将学会如何理性地评估你的论点。

name: It takes a long time to walk to university.
trans: 步行到大学要花很长时间。

name: University staff provide advice on renting and accommodation.
trans: 大学工作人员提供租房和住宿方面的建议。

name: Slides and handouts can be downloaded after lectures.
trans: 课后可以下载幻灯片和讲义

name: Business practices must obey contemporary general regulations.
trans: 商业实践必须遵守现行的普遍规定。

name: The news will not be received until the following week.
trans: 消息要到下一周才会收到。

name: We can see the stars that were formed thirteen billion years ago.
trans: 我们可以看到 130 亿年前形成的恒星。

name: As student union members, you can influence and change our university.
trans: 作为学生会的成员，你可以影响并改变我们的大学。

name: The horizontal line on the graph indicates that there was no change in the period.
trans: 图表上的水平线表示这一时期没有变化。

name: Purity is one feature that makes gold expensive.
trans: 纯度是使黄金昂贵的一个特质。

name: Even simple techniques need to be practiced to become better.
trans: 即使是简单的技巧也需要练习才能变得更好。

name: Studying history can help you better understand the present.
trans: 学习历史可以帮助你更好地理解现在。

name: Many food crops require large amounts of water and fertilizer.
trans: 许多粮食作物需要大量的水和肥料。

name: The course covers architecture planning and construction on the international scale.
trans: 课程涵盖了国际范围内的建筑规划与建造。

name: Imported default packages are likely to be used for most computers.
trans: 大多数计算机可能会使用导入默认包。

name: Studying medicine allows for a wide range of career opportunities.
trans: 学习医学提供了广泛的职业机会。

name: Classical mechanics is sometimes considered as a branch of applied mathematics.
trans: 经典力学有时候被认为是应用数学的一个分支。

name: The deadline for the marketing assignment has been extended.
trans: 市场营销作业的截止时间被延后了。

name: This course aims to develop your knowledge of statistics.
trans: 这门课程旨在发展你的统计学知识。

name: Professors with higher educational standards trained them extremely seriously.
trans: 具有较高教育水平的教授极其认真地训练他们。

name: Eating fish twice a week is recommended for a healthy diet.
trans: 每周吃两次鱼是健康饮食的建议。

name: Information technology has changed the way people study today.
trans: 信息技术改变了人们今天学习的方式。

name: The library will stay open until midnight this week.
trans: 图书馆本周将一直开放到午夜。

name: Two sides have disagreed on how to solve the problem.
trans: 双方在如何解决这个问题上意见不一。

name: The very basic feature of computing would be counting and calculating.
trans: 计算机算法的最基本特征应该是计数与运算。

name: Babies can distinguish between what is language and what is not.
trans: 婴儿能够区分什么是语言，什么不是语言。

name: Psychologists say that what we have experienced influences our behaviors.
trans: 心理学家说，我们的经历会影响我们的行为。

name: Many university lectures can now be viewed on the internet.
trans: 现在可以在网上观看许多大学的讲座。

name: Urbanization provides the expenses of other communities.
trans: 城市化为其他社区的提供了经费。

name: Students are required to have an undergraduate degree in Biology to be enrolled in this course.
trans: 修这门课的学生必须有生物学学士学位。

name: Philosophy uses logic and reasons to analyze human experiences.
trans: 哲学用逻辑和理由来分析人类的经验。

name: Field trips are an essential part of geography courses.
trans: 实地考察是地理课程的重要组成部分。

name: Please return the reference book to the correct position on the library shelf.
trans: 请把参考书放回图书馆书架上正确的位置。

name: Providers of higher education treat plagiarism extremely seriously.
trans: 高等教育机构对抄袭的态度极其严肃。

name: Extracurricular activities can help students develop more talents.
trans: 课外活动可以帮助学生发展更多的才能。

name: The government is funding a research study on the consequences of unemployment.
trans: 政府正在资助一项关于失业影响的研究。

name: A visit to the designed museum is of great value.
trans: 参观精心设计的博物馆是非常有价值的。

name: There are many different styles of business management.
trans: 商业管理有许多不同的风格。

name: The digital camera has some advantages over traditional film.
trans: 数码相机比传统胶卷有一些优势。

name: The university provides excellent leisure facilities for students and staff.
trans: 大学为学生和职员提供优质的休闲设施。

name: The history of economics is a tricky subject to study.
trans: 经济学史是一门棘手的学科。

name: Undergraduates may pursue their specific interests within certificate programs.
trans: 本科生可以在认证课程中追求自己的爱好。

name: Air pollution is a serious problem all over the world.
trans: 空气污染在全世界都是个严重的问题。

name: Urban planning emphasizes efficiency and expansion of communities.
trans: 城市规划强调效率和社区的扩展。

name: The course will start with the history of architecture.
trans: 这门课程将从建筑学的历史开始。

name: Please note that the seminar has now been canceled.
trans: 请注意，研讨会现已取消。

name: Scholarship applications must be handed in by the end of this month.
trans: 奖学金申请必须在这个月底之前交上来。

name: Please return your reference books to the library shelves.
trans: 请把你的参考书归还到图书馆的书架上。

name: Art and design is a competitive field to work in.
trans: 艺术设计是个具有竞争力的工作领域。

name: Many diseases that were once serious have now been eradicated.
trans: 许多曾经严重的疾病现在已被根除。

name: The urban geography degree includes the study of demography.
trans: 城市地理学位包括对人口统计学的研究。

name: Nutrition plays a key role in athletic performance.
trans: 营养物质在运动表现中起着关键作用。

name: Sugar is a solid carbohydrate which is always used to sweeten food.
trans: 糖是一种固体碳水化合物，常被用来使食物变甜。

name: Our workshops are opening for all students on campus.
trans: 我们的工作坊对校园里的所有学生开放。

name: Reading histories involves a level of careful selections.
trans: 阅读历史书需要一定程度的仔细选择。

name: Many universities provide exchange programs to other countries.
trans: 许多大学提供到其他国家的交换项目。

name: The deadline for this assignment is next Wednesday.
trans: 这个作业的截止日期是下周三。

name: City planners recognize the need for accessible public transport options.
trans: 城市规划者认识到无障碍公共交通的必要性。

name: There are a variety of different ways to present statistical information.
trans: 有各种不同的方式来表示统计信息。

name: The degree is taught by using a mixture of lectures and seminars.
trans: 该学位是通过讲座和研讨课的结合来教授的。

name: The student magazine is looking for a new editor.
trans: 学生杂志正在找一位新编辑。

name: Scholarships are available for both local and international students.
trans: 本地及国际学生均可获得奖学金。

name: Libraries in many areas were closed due to the lack of funding.
trans: 许多地区的图书馆由于缺乏资金而关闭。

name: Accommodation on campus is limited but there are more options nearby.
trans: 校园住宿有限，但附近有更多选择。

name: All students have their own style of learning.
trans: 所有的学生都有自己的学习风格。

name: This course can help to deepen your appreciation of art.
trans: 这门课程有助增强你对艺术的鉴赏力。

name: The research shows that spending time outdoors has a range of benefits.
trans: 研究表明花时间在户外有一系列的好处。

name: Career mobility is very important for new graduates.
trans: 职业流动性 (能在不同工作之间转换的能力) 对应届毕业生来说非常重要。

name: The amount of time spent on configuration varies considerably.
trans: 花费在配置上的时间差别很大。

name: Academic journals are usually edited by subject specialists.
trans: 学术期刊通常由学科专家编辑。

name: Our company must have independent financial auditing.
trans: 我们公司必须有独立的财务审计。

name: Please make sure your applications follow the guideline provided.
trans: 请确保您的申请符合所提供的标准。

name: Understanding visual media has never been more challenging.
trans: 了解视觉媒体这件事从来没有像现在这样具有挑战性。

name: An essay should use evidence from both primary and secondary sources.
trans: 一篇文章会使用一手资源和二手资源的论据。

name: A surprisingly large number of students applied for that course.
trans: 申请那门课程的学生人数多得惊人。

name: The university library holds a number of collections of geological maps.
trans: 大学图书馆收藏了许多地质图。

name: Students are encouraged to read new books recommended by Professor Jones.
trans: 鼓励学生阅读琼斯教授推荐的新书。

name: We help individuals to develop and follow their interests.
trans: 我们帮助个人发展并追随他们的兴趣。

name: Our company currently employs more than ten thousand people worldwide.
trans: 我们公司目前在全球拥有员工超过一万人。

name: It is clear that the human population has an impact on the environment.
trans: 很明显，人口对环境有影响。

name: It is an integrated course with several main elements.
trans: 这是一门由几个主要元素组成的综合性课程。

name: The public is often misled by biased coverage.
trans: 公众经常被有偏见的报道所误导。

name: The extent of advertising to children is very much open to debate.
trans: 广告对儿童的影响程度是很容易引起争论的。

name: The closing date of applications for travel scholarships is next Monday.
trans: 旅游奖学金的申请截止日期是下星期一。

name: The university's main library will be open till midnight next Saturday.
trans: 大学的主图书馆将在下周六开放至午夜。

name: Students may only park their cars in authorized university parking spaces.
trans: 学生只能将车停在学校指定的停车位。

name: The study of utilizing projects is funded by the university.
trans: 运用项目的研究由大学资助。

name: We help students to develop their individualities and follow their interests.
trans: 我们帮助学生发展他们的个性，并遵循他们的兴趣。

name: Many universities are continuously expanding the postgraduate education online learning resources.
trans: 许多高校都在不断扩大研究生教育的在线学习资源。

name: Our aim is to transmit mathematics teaching in the classroom.
trans: 我们的目标是在课堂上进行数学教学。

name: Experts said reading and listening to music can reduce stress.
trans: 专家说阅读和听音乐可以减轻压力。

name: The night sky has always involved mystery and wonder.
trans: 夜空总是充满神秘和惊奇。

name: Please refer to the guidelines for more information on setting goals.
trans: 有关设定目标的更多信息，请参阅指南。

name: The terms, illness and disease, are confusing despite clear differences.
trans: 尽管 “病” 和 “疾病” 有明显的区别，但这两个术语仍然令人困惑。

name: Every living thing begins as a single cell.
trans: 所有生物都是从单个细胞开始的。

name: These words recognized the excellence of the undergraduates’ research projects.
trans: 这些话肯定了本科生研究项目的优秀。

name: Technology is no longer a simple tool that we can control.
trans: 科技不再是我们可以控制的简单工具。

name: The teaching staff are actively engaged in the original research.
trans: 教职工积极从事原创性研究。

name: There is no economic reason why public borrowing is necessarily bad.
trans: 没有经济原因可以解释为什么公共借贷一定是坏事。

name: For the purpose of the research, data should be collected and analyzed.
trans: 为了达到研究目的，应该收集数据和分析数据。

name: The deadline for the submission of this assignment is tomorrow.
trans: 交作业的最后期限是明天。

name: We are phasing out disposable cups on campus.
trans: 我们正在校园里逐步淘汰一次性杯子。

name: British students must study mathematics at secondary schools.
trans: 英国学生在中学必须学习数学。

name: Companies’ projects must adapt to the general data protection regulations.
trans: 公司的项目必须适应常规的数据保护规定。

name: Our aim is to transform classical teaching in the classroom.
trans: 我们的目标是改造传统的课堂教学。

name: He wrote poetry and plays as well as scientific papers.
trans: 他不仅写科学论文，还写诗歌和戏剧。

name: You need to hand in an essay next semester.
trans: 你需要在下个学期交一篇论文。

name: Scientific experiments should be repeated to verify the results.
trans: 应该重复科学实验来验证结果。

name: We are more able to accommodate postgraduate students than previously possible.
trans: 我们比以前更有能力安顿研究生。

name: Please click on the logo above to enter the site.
trans: 请点击上面的网站徽标进入网站。

name: There are a wide variety of disciplines in the field of engineering.
trans: 在工程领域有各种各样的学科。

name: Parents are financially responsible for their children right up until they reach adulthood.
trans: 父母对他们的孩子负有经济责任，直到他们成年

name: The untapped potential of using sunray is phenomenal.
trans: 利用太阳光的潜力是惊人的。

name: Students are encouraged to think carefully about their accommodation needs.
trans: 我们鼓励学生仔细考虑他们的住宿需求。

name: Peer review is an essential part of scientific methods.
trans: 同行评议是科研方法的重要组成部分。

name: Advanced technology created growth in the economy.
trans: 先进科技创造了经济增长。

name: The study of anthropology can help us learn about society today.
trans: 人类学的研究可以帮助我们了解当今社会。

name: Lecture outlines are available on the college internal website.
trans: 课程大纲可在学院内部网站上查阅。

name: This course places considerable emphasis on critical thinking skills.
trans: 本课程相当重视批判性思维技能。

name: Most students need computers to do their homework.
trans: 大多数学生需要电脑来做作业。

name: Doctoral writings have the structure in place as well as scientific papers.
trans: 博士论文和科研论文都有这样的结构。

name: A typical part of the course involves the study of society.
trans: 这门课程的一个典型部分包括了社会研究。

name: Optional tutorials are offered in the final week of the term.
trans: 选修辅导课在学期的最后一周提供。

name: Banks charge interest on the money they lend to customers.
trans: 银行从借给客户的钱中收取利息。

name: The aim of the course is to encourage students to develop their creativity.
trans: 这门课程的目的是鼓励学生发展他们的创造力。

name: Scientists have founded all parts of society today.
trans: 科学家们建立了当今社会的各个部分。

name: Physics is the key subject to understanding the world and the universe.
trans: 物理学是理解世界和宇宙的关键学科。

name: Practical experience is a vital part of legal training.
trans: 实践经验是法律培训的重要组成部分。

name: This new camera can identify your eyes and focus on them.
trans: 这个新相机可以识别你的眼睛并对其进行聚焦。

name: There is a pharmacy on campus near the bookstore.
trans: 校园里书店附近有个药房。

name: Recession triggers exciting creativity and high rates of public wisdom.
trans: 经济衰退激发了令人兴奋的创造力和高比例的公众智慧。

name: Students will focus on reporting news on changing the media world.
trans: 学生将专注于报道改变媒体世界的新闻。

name: Globalization has been an overwhelming urbanization phenomenon.
trans: 全球化是一种势不可挡的城市化现象。

name: The other book isn't thorough, but it's more insightful.
trans: 另一本书不够详尽，但更有见地。

name: Art is an expression of creative skills and imagination.
trans: 艺术是创造力和想象力的表现。

name: Humans use symbolic language to communicate plans and contentions.
trans: 人类使用象征语言来沟通计划和争论。

name: Building trust is not something that can be achieved overnight.
trans: 建立信任不是一朝一夕就能实现的。

name: An architect is required to have problem-solving skills and an eye for design.
trans: 建筑师需要有解决问题的能力和设计的眼光。

name: The university will cease the colossal renovation of the faint empty theater.
trans: 这所大学将停止对那座昏暗的空剧院的大规模整修。

name: A wide range of courses covered different aspects in this subject.
trans: 许多课程涵盖了这门学科的不同方面。

name: In his lifetime, he composed a large number of works.
trans: 他一生创作了大量的作品。

name: Online courses enable people to improve their skills while employed.
trans: 在线课程使人们能够在就业时提高他们的技能。

name: The university now faces a series of challenges of finance.
trans: 这所大学现在面临着一系列财务方面的挑战。

name: The exam application system has been upgraded for professional exams.
trans: 针对专业考试我们升级了考试申请系统。

name: In addition to class requirements, students must pass all the qualifying examinations.
trans: 除了课堂要求之外，学生还必须通过所有资格考试。

name: New media have transcended traditional national boundaries.
trans: 新媒体超越了传统的国界。

name: Please confirm that you have received the textbook.
trans: 请确认课本已经收到。

name: Research showed that knowledge and experience are essential to creativity.
trans: 研究表明，知识和经验对创造力至关重要。

name: The results of this research presented a value of the balance of the ecosystem.
trans: 本研究结果具有生态系统平衡的价值。

name: The marketing budget has been doubled since the beginning of the year.
trans: 营销预算自年初以来已经翻了一番。

name: We encourage students to complete their applications before the deadline.
trans: 我们鼓励学生在截止日期前完成申请。

name: I will come back to this in a moment.
trans: 我稍后会回到这个问题上。

name: The curriculum should be adjusted to incorporate recent developments.
trans: 课程应加以调整，以纳入最近的发展。

name: The student shop sells a range of stationery.
trans: 学生商店出售各种文具。

name: Let me give you an example to explain what I mean.
trans: 让我举个例子来解释我的意思。

name: Tutors should set clear goals at the start of the class.
trans: 导师应该在课程开始时设定明确的目标。

name: She began by giving an outline of the previous lecture.
trans: 她首先针对上一讲的内容进行了概述。

name: Strangely, people are simultaneously impressed by and skeptical about statistics.
trans: 奇怪的是，人们对 “统计数据” 既感到印象深刻又持怀疑态度。

name: The timetable for the next term will be available next week.
trans: 下学期的课程表将于下周公布。

name: Most of the lectures begin punctually, so do not be late.
trans: 大多数的讲座都会准时开始，所以不要迟到。

name: The stock market crash had repercussions throughout the world.
trans: 股市崩盘在全世界产生了影响。

name: The student union hosts a variety of social events.
trans: 学生会举办各种各样的社交活动。

name: Default designed packages are likely to be used for most computers.
trans: 大多数电脑都可能使用默认设计的包装。

name: The museum is closed on the third Monday of every month.
trans: 博物馆每个月的第三个星期一闭馆。

name: Formal conclusions could be established through rigorous experiments.
trans: 通过严格的实验可以得出正式的结论。

name: Our faculty includes five libraries across the university.
trans: 我们学院在大学里有五间图书馆。

name: The reception staff can give advice on renting private accommodation.
trans: 接待处的工作人员可以提供租用私人住所的建议。

name: Muscles bring parts of the body close together.
trans: 肌肉使身体各部分紧密相连。

name: The library will be closed for staff training tomorrow morning.
trans: 图书馆将于明天上午闭馆进行员工培训。

name: Too much information may have been avoided by the group research design.
trans: 小组研究设计可能避免了太多的信息。

name: The biology department is respected in research activities.
trans: 生物系在研究活动中受到尊重。

name: Critical thinking is an essential component of a broad education.
trans: 批判性思维是广泛教育的重要组成部分。

name: The English degree involves work placements in the third year.
trans: 英语学位在第三年安排实习。

name: Technologies have enormously transformed the lifestyle of the majority.
trans: 科技极大地改变了大多数人的生活方式。

name: A regional assembly was moved to the devolution of power.
trans: 地方议会被转移到权力下放（句意不对，有待补充）

name: Scientists recognize different ice types according to the water molecule content.
trans: 科学家们根据水分子的含量来识别不同类型的冰。

name: Having a strong motivation is important to achieve your goals.
trans: 有一个强大的动力对实现你的目标很重要。

name: It is interesting to observe the development of the language skills of toddlers.
trans: 观察幼儿语言技能的发展是很有趣的。

name: Children start producing words before they are able to walk.
trans: 孩子们在会走路之前就开始说话了。

name: The skills of a great stage actor cannot be taught.
trans: 伟大的舞台演员的技巧是教不来的。

name: The jobs tomorrow will require higher skill levels.
trans: 未来的工作将需要更高的技能水平。

name: The goal of the government policy is to increase the investments.
trans: 政府政策的目标是增加投资。

name: Social media is responsible for helping the government to solve social problems.
trans: 社交媒体有责任帮助政府解决社会问题。

name: The university library has a collection of early geography maps.
trans: 大学图书馆收藏了早期的地理地图。

name: Courses are assessed by group work and individual assignments.
trans: 课程通过小组作业和个人作业进行评估。

name: Online courses allow students to work at their own pace.
trans: 在线课程允许学生按照自己的节奏学习。

name: The academic department needs to be supported by the government.
trans: 学术部门需要由政府提供支持。

name: Businesses must adapt to the general data protection regulations.
trans: 企业必须适应通用数据保护法规。

name: When sentencing, the court will consider whether the criminal is guilty or not.
trans: 在宣判时，法院将考虑罪犯是否有罪。

name: The internet has transformed the nature of publishing.
trans: 互联网改变了出版业的本质。

name: More research is required in the field of food science.
trans: 在食品科学领域需要进行更多的研究。

name: Many important policies need to be made.
trans: 需要制定许多重要的政策。

name: The academic tradition of the school ensures excellence.
trans: 学校的学术传统保证了卓越。

name: The scientists found most of the studies today.
trans: 科学家们创立了目前大部分的研究。

name: For the small business, making profit is the main priority.
trans: 对于小企业来说，盈利是首要任务。

name: Agricultural development plays a vital role in rural areas
trans: 农业在农村发展中起着至关重要的作用

name: The new research has produced some unexpected results.
trans: 这项新研究产生了一些意想不到的结果。

name: The falling birth rate means the number of students dropped.
trans: 出生率的下降意味着学生人数的减少。

name: Sociology policies are the sources of the government to solve social problems.
trans: 社会学政策是政府解决社会问题的源泉。

name: We hold visiting tours throughout the year for undergraduate students.
trans: 我们全年为本科生举办参观活动。

name: Rising inflation leads to increasing goods prices and decreasing demand for products.
trans: 通货膨胀上升导致商品价格上涨和产品需求下降。

name: When sentencing, the court will decide whether the defendant regrets his actions.
trans: 宣判时，法院将决定被告是否后悔自己的行为。

name: Employment figures will decrease in the next few years.
trans: 未来几年，就业人数将会下降。

name: Each faculty has a dedicated specialized librarian available in the term examination.
trans: 每个院系都有专门的图书管理员在学期考试时提供帮助。

name: Criminal charges will be brought against all of the men.
trans: 所有这些人都将受到刑事指控。

name: The aim of the policy is to increase government investment.
trans: 该政策的目的是增加政府投资。

name: We are continuing to provide postgraduate online learning resources.
trans: 我们正在持续提供研究生在线学习资源。

name: The study is among the initial projects funded by the university.
trans: 这项研究是该大学资助的首批项目之一。

name: Writing history needs a careful selection process of historical sources.
trans: 撰写历史需要仔细选择历史资料。

name: It is argued that students can learn more by collaboration rather than as individuals.
trans: 有人认为，学生通过合作而不是单独学习可以学得更多。

name: Open days for undergraduates occur all year round for campus visits.
trans: 全年都有本科生参观校园的开放日。

name: All lectures and learning materials can be found on the internet.
trans: 所有的讲座和学习材料都可以在网上找到。

name: Academic libraries across the world are steadily incorporating social media.
trans: 世界各地的学术图书馆都在逐步地使用社交媒体。

name: The residence hall is closed prior to the academic building closing time at the end of the semester.
trans: 学期结束时，学生宿舍的关闭时间在教学楼的关闭时间之前。

name: Medical books and journals have been moved to the second floor.
trans: 医学书籍和期刊被移到了二楼。

name: Gold is a metal that appears naturally and in a pure state.
trans: 黄金是一种自然出现的金属，处于纯净状态。

name: Your tutor will show you how to prepare the essay.
trans: 你的导师会告诉你如何准备论文。

name: Mental health professionals are talking about the topic of vulnerability.
trans: 心理健康专家正在谈论脆弱性这个话题。

name: Music has the ability to shape our emotions.
trans: 音乐有塑造我们情感的能力。

name: Your tutor will provide the guidance on how to structure the essays.
trans: 你的导师会指导你如何组织论文结构。

name: The aerial photographs were promptly registered for thorough evaluation.
trans: 航拍照片被迅速登记，以便进行全面的评估。

name: The application processes may take longer than expected.
trans: 申请过程可能比预期的时间更长。

name: While reconciliation is desirable, basic underlying issues must first be addressed.
trans: 希望得到和解必须首先处理基本的根本问题。

name: New developments in manufacturing are changing the way we live.
trans: 制造业的新发展正在改变我们的生活方式。

name: The momentum is defined as the combination of mass and velocity.
trans: 动量被定义为质量和速度的结合。

name: Nowadays, accounting is far more important for business than ever before.
trans: 如今，会计对企业来说比以往任何时候都重要得多。
